definition: of a female body, healthily plump and vigorous
details:
adjective
- of a female body, healthily plump and vigorous
= example: of a female body, healthily plump and vigorous
= synonyms: zaftig, zoftig
- (of a woman's body) having a large bosom and pleasing curves
= synonyms: bosomy, busty, curvaceous, curvy, full-bosomed, sonsie, sonsy, stacked, well-endowed
